Lyric:
[by:NightSurround]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:09.10]There are places I'll remember
[00:13.66]All my life, though some have changed
[00:18.19]Some forever, not for better
[00:22.33]Some have gone and some remain
[00:27.55]All these places had their moments
[00:31.92]With lovers and friends, I still can recall
[00:36.77]Some are dead and some are living
[00:41.14]In my life, I've loved them all
[00:50.83]But of all these friends and lovers
[00:55.42]There is no one compares with you
[01:00.19]And these memories lose their meaning
[01:04.48]When I think of love as something new
[01:09.76]Though I know I'll never lose affection
[01:14.19]For people and things that went before
[01:19.01]I know I'll often stop and think about them
[01:23.58]In my life, I'll love you more
[01:46.77]Though I know I'll never lose affection
[01:51.54]For people and things that went before
[01:55.97]I know I'll often stop and think about them
[02:10.90][02:00.58]In my life, I'll love you more
